articles.author: WION Desk
articles.title: 5 Health Benefits Of Khus Khus - WION
articles.content: Khus khus seeds are packed with nutrients such as dietary fibre, protein, healthy fats, vitamins (especially B-complex vitamins), and minerals (including calcium, magnesium, and phosphorus).
